metadata.description: Family Gifting Dashboard - A private, collaborative web app for couples and families to coordinate gift planning across occasions
metadata.author: Family Dashboard Team

PROJECT_NAME.description: Project or organization name used in agent descriptions, templates, and configuration

PROJECT_DESCRIPTION.description: Brief description of the project and its primary purpose
PROJECT_DESCRIPTION.default: Family gifting dashboard for collaborative gift planning and coordination

PROJECT_DOMAIN.description: Primary business domain or industry of the project

PROJECT_ARCHITECTURE.description: System architecture description explaining how layers and components interact
PROJECT_ARCHITECTURE.default: Next.js Frontend → FastAPI Backend → SQLAlchemy ORM → PostgreSQL (layered architecture with WebSocket real-time updates)

LAYER_ARCHITECTURE.description: Detailed breakdown of architectural layers from database to deployment
LAYER_ARCHITECTURE.default:
1. Database Layer (PostgreSQL schema, migrations)
2. Repository Layer (SQLAlchemy data access, queries)
3. Service Layer (business logic, DTOs)
4. API Layer (FastAPI routes, validation)
5. UI Layer (Next.js components, hooks)
6. Real-time Layer (WebSocket event streams)
7. Testing Layer (unit, integration, E2E)
8. Deployment Layer (Docker, self-hosted)

ARCHITECTURE_DIAGRAM.description: URL to architecture diagram or ASCII art representation of system architecture

PROJECT_STANDARDS.description: Core standards and patterns enforced across the codebase
PROJECT_STANDARDS.default: Layered architecture, DTOs in separate modules, real-time WebSocket updates, typed models (TypeScript/Python), mobile-first responsive design, PWA-ready

VALIDATION_RULES.description: Task completion and code validation criteria specific to the project
VALIDATION_RULES.default: Typed models, mobile-first responsive, real-time collaboration support, secure auth, test coverage for critical paths

NAMING_CONVENTION.description: Naming conventions for tasks, issues, branches, and identifiers
NAMING_CONVENTION.default: PREFIX-NUMBER format (e.g., FEAT-123), kebab-case slugs, semantic versioning

CODE_QUALITY_STANDARDS.description: Code quality expectations and enforcement rules
CODE_QUALITY_STANDARDS.default: Type safety (TypeScript/Python typing), separation of concerns (Repository → Service → API), secure data access, test coverage for business logic

PM_WORKFLOW.description: Primary product management tool and workflow system

TASK_TRACKER.description: Task tracking system name (often same as PM_WORKFLOW)

SPRINT_DURATION.description: Sprint duration in days (use 'Continuous' for flow-based development)

APPROVAL_WORKFLOW.description: Code review and approval process for PRs/MRs

DOC_POLICY.default: Document only when explicitly needed, in allowed buckets, or for tracking. Prioritize code clarity and practical guides.

DOC_BUCKETS.default: User Documentation, Developer Documentation, Architecture & Design, README Files, Configuration, Testing, Product Planning, API Documentation

ADR_PATH.description: Location where Architecture Decision Records are stored

DOC_FRONTMATTER.description: Required YAML frontmatter fields for documentation files
DOC_FRONTMATTER.default: title, description, audience, tags, created, updated

OBSERVABILITY_REQUIRED.description: Whether observability (logging, tracing, metrics) is required in the project

LOGGING_FORMAT.description: Standard logging format for application logs

PERMISSIONS.description: Tool permissions configuration for Claude Code (deny/ask/allow rules)

HOOKS.description: Pre/post tool-use hooks for Claude Code integration

AUTH_METHOD.description: Primary authentication method for the application

ENV_GATE_SECRET.description: Secret for development authentication bypass (32+ chars, generated)

PROJECT_PATHS.description: Project directory structure and key paths

EXCLUDED_PATHS.description: Paths to exclude from analysis and symbol generation

SYMBOL_FILES.description: Symbol file locations and domain mappings

BACKEND_LANGUAGE.description: Primary backend programming language and version

UI_LIBRARY.description: UI component library and styling approach
UI_LIBRARY.default: Radix UI components with Tailwind CSS

PROJECT_EXAMPLES.description: Real code examples and patterns from the project codebase
PROJECT_EXAMPLES.default: See docs/project_plans/ for PRDs and planning documentation

EXAMPLE_FEATURE.description: A real feature example to illustrate project patterns
EXAMPLE_FEATURE.default: Real-time collaborative gift list planning with status updates

EXAMPLE_ARCHITECTURE.description: Detailed example of the project's architecture
EXAMPLE_ARCHITECTURE.default: Full layered architecture: Next.js → FastAPI → SQLAlchemy → PostgreSQL with WebSocket real-time layer

EXAMPLE_ERROR_HANDLING.description: Example of proper error handling in the project
EXAMPLE_ERROR_HANDLING.default: FastAPI exception handlers with clear error messages and HTTP status codes

COMPLEXITY_SCALE.default: S (1-3 days), M (4-7 days), L (1-2 weeks), XL (3+ weeks)

CONFIG_VERSION.description: Version of this configuration format (not project version)

SCHEMA_VERSION.description: Version of the configuration JSON schema
